data.actual_result: Can also trigger when different combinations of keys are clicked as described above
data.expected_result: Only triggers when control + <any key> is clicked.
data.short_description: Keybinds with control+key will trigger when shift+key or ctrl+shift+key or ctrl+alt+key is pressed
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a keybind for anything, set it to control + <any key> - Try holding shift + <any key> or control + shift + <any key> or control + alt + <any key> - Note <any key> is the same in these examples.
